Package command

Class CommandManager

java.lang.Object
command.CommandManager
public class CommandManager extends Object
This singleton class is mainly responsible for managing all commands functionality such as, registering, handling and invoking commands. Uses a command pattern inspired by some games that have console features
Author:
Michael Liu, Genfu Liu

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final List<Command>
    commands
    A list (custom class, not java's list) of all the registered commands
    static final int
    EXECUTE_ERROR
    Returned when ran into an error when invoking a command, currently does nothing and the program will continue to run
    static final int
    EXECUTE_EXIT
    A special execution status that is returned and tells the program to exit
    static final int
    EXECUTE_SUCCESS
    Returned when invoking a command if it has been successfully executed
    private static CommandManager
    instance
    This class implements the Singleton pattern for easier access of this class throughout the entire program as well as limiting multiple instance of it to be created since this application will most likely only need 1 command manager.

    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description

    CommandManager()
    A private constructor that is used to register all the commands

  • Field Details

    • instance

      private static CommandManager instance
      This class implements the Singleton pattern for easier access of this class throughout the entire program as well as limiting multiple instance of it to be created since this application will most likely only need 1 command manager.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CommandManager getInstance()
      Static method to get the single instance of this class
      Returns:
      the single instance of this class

    • registerCommand

      public void registerCommand(String label, String[] aliases, String description, CommandExecutor commandExecutor)
      This registers a command into the command list which then if the client runs the command, it will invoke the commandExecutor
      Parameters:
      label - the main command
      aliases - any aliases the command has
      description - a brief description of the command
      commandExecutor - the command executor for that command

    • invoke

      public int invoke(String rawMessage)
      Handles and invokes a command that the client runs
      Parameters:
      rawMessage - the raw line of message that the client inputs, which will be parsed.
      Returns:
      the execute status of invoking the command

    • getExecutor

      public CommandExecutor getExecutor(String label)
      Gets a command's executor from its name
      Parameters:
      label - the main command's name
      Returns:
      the command's executor

    • getAllCommands

      public List<Command> getAllCommands()
      Gets all the available commands
      Returns:
      a list (custom) representing all the commands
